channel.title: How to not make Norton Anti-Virus 2006 delete Hack Tools?
channel.description: How do you not make Norton Anti-Virus 2006 delete Hack Tools? ... i went into options and unchecked 'Scan & Delete Hack Toold' but it keeps deleting it when i download it saying.. Warning! Trojan! Type: Hack Tool.... how do you download them with norton anti virus on but making it not delete the hack tool????

item.title: How to not make Norton Anti-Virus 2006 delete Hack Tools?
item.dc:creator: @bobperson bobperson
item.description:
@bobperson wrote:

right click the norton anti-virus thing in the tray or whatevers in the botton left corner of the screen and just turn auto protect off

Read full topic
